message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $120?
I understand that $180 is a bit high for you, but I was thinking more along the lines of $160. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $140?
I'm willing to meet you at $145, but I'm getting a bit hesitant to go any lower. This is already a good deal for me, so I'm not sure I can go lower than that.
I understand that $145 is a good deal for you, but I'm really trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $130?
